text: Costa Rica, officially the Republic of Costa Rica, is a sovereign state in Central America. Costa Rica may also refer to: ==Places== *Costa Rica, Sinaloa, a town south of Culiacán in Sinaloa, Mexico *Costa Rica, Mato Grosso do Sul, a municipality located in the Brazilian state of Mato Grosso do Sul *Costa Rica (El Salvador, Cuba), a locality in El Salvador, Cuba ==Others== *"Costa Rica", a 2019 song by Dreamville, from the album Revenge of the Dreamers III *"Costa Rica" (song), a 2019 song by Benjamin Ingrosso * "Costa Rica", a 2020 song by Bankrol Hayden
title: Costa Rica (disambiguation)
